title: yield_until: support yielding until a specific PhaseStep
description:
The current yield_until implementation supports XMage's built-in yield actions (end_of_turn, next_turn, next_main, etc.). A future enhancement could allow yielding until a specific PhaseStep (e.g. 'yield until opponent's declare_attackers step') for more precise control.

This would require either:
1. A custom yield mechanism in BridgeCallbackHandler that checks the current step on each callback
2. Extending XMage's PlayerAction enum with step-specific yields (upstream change)

Approach #1 is more feasible since it doesn't require upstream changes.
